name: Cylindrical Bottle Package
description: 円筒形ボトル型パッケージデザイン。飲料、化粧品、シャンプーなどに最適です。
promptTemplate:
Create an elegant product package design for a cylindrical bottle with label.

Product Information:
- Category: {category}
- Primary Color: {primaryColor}
- Secondary Colors: {secondaryColors}
- Surface Texture: {texture}

Design Requirements:
- Sophisticated cylindrical bottle design
- Premium label design wrapped around bottle
- Vertical orientation with full bottle visible
- Transparent or colored bottle material
- Professional label artwork
- Elegant typography and branding
- Reflective surface and professional lighting
